mapper.select: SELECT b.id, a.name, a.work_Unit workUnit, b.CLASSIFICATION_LEVEL classificationLevel, b.ABROAD_REASONS abroadReasons FROM cf_certificate_collection a INNER JOIN oms_pri_apply b ON a.busi_id = b.id WHERE a.oms_id = '' AND a.data_source = '1' AND a.cj_status = '2' ORDER BY a.CREATETIME DESC LIMIT 1
